column3: This should also make getdata only use the relaypool to close off the mempool privacy loss. \n
@gmaxwell Sounds reasonable, but I think out of scope of this pull-req.\n
Would it make sense also to trigger this when bloom filters are enabled, but `pfrom` has not set one?\n
Simple test you might want to pull into this PR:\nhttps://github.com/jonasschnelli/bitcoin/commit/3d3602faf4a47855be264f05d9d52253e8bd0f9d\n
Also useful to bootstrap a mempool.\n

@luke-jr That's why it's still allowed for whitelisted nodes; in general it's a DoS attack and we need a better system. Also we discussed the bootstrap case and think getting all the mempool isn't actually all that useful, for things we expect to need it like block relaying optimizations - need a subset.\n
Can one of the admins verify this patch?\n
@petertodd @jonasschnelli Interested in fixing the two nits for the rpc test?\n
Going to merge this - the nits can be done later.\n

Could you use `__init__` for that, instead of overwriting `setup_chain`?

I.e. something like

``` py
    def __init__(self):
        super().__init__()
        self.num_nodes = 2
        self.setup_clean_chain = True # not needed (default should already be true)
```
